text: (Anal) nampikkai kontu narkarumankal ceyvorukku nanmarayankal kuruviraka! Cata otikkontirukkum arukalaik konta cuvanac colaikal avarkalukkaka untu, avarkalukku unna ankiruntu etavatu kani kotukkappatumpotellam"ituve munnarum namakku (ulakil) kotukkappattirukkiratu" enru kuruvarkal; anal (torrattil) itu ponratutan (avarkalukku ulakattir) kotukkappattiruntana, innum avarkalukku anku tuya tunaiviyarum untu, melum avarkal anke nirantaramaka valvarkal
